amendment.description: Amendment provides an achievement award to Pell Grant eligible students who graduate in the top 10 percent of their high school graduating class.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 44 in the Congressional Record of april 28, 1998 to provide an achievement award to Pell Grant eligible students who graduate in the top 10 percent of their high school graduating class.
